price: و نوح [پس از نصیحت‌ و دعوت] گفت: «پروردگارا، به راستی که من قومِ خود را شب و روز [به ایمان] دعوت کردم؛
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِي لَيۡلٗا وَنَهَارٗا

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī daʿawtu qawmī laylan wanahāran
